page.title: 01Description Of Locality
page.content: Magor and Undy are small villages in south_east Gwent,situated between.Caldicot and Newport,about half a mile off the M4 junction.It's close to the cities of Cardiff and Bristol , this goegraphical position makes the village an ideal area for development ,and is one reason for the major changes taking place.The development is already well on it's way,with plans to combine the villages of Magor and Undy and raise their population from the present 1,500 to a population of 5,500 in the late 1980's The surrounding area taken up by farming on low lying ground reclaimed from the sea.An area of concern is the affect development will have on the Marshland Reserve.It is hoped the closeness of the reserve to the village,with increasing population will not affect the habitat.
